DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate clinical practice change Disease Activity Score ( DAS28 ) patient rheumatoid arthritis inadequate response DMARDs initiate treatment RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) . Data collect eligible patient ( 8 mg/kg 4 mg/kg intravenously every 4 week , without methotrexate ) 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Have Inadequate Response DMARDs
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Moderate severe active rheumatoid arthritis Inadequate response intolerance previous therapy one traditional DMARDs Pregnant lactate woman Active infection Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV infection Concomitant antiTNF drug Contraindications treatment RoActemra/Actemra
